text:
Hay 3, 1961
NIGHT LETTER: SEND AS BOOK MESSAGE
CHARGE: National Assoication of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 6, D. C.
Harris still has no reply your governor re letter March 28 asking
indication of interest in using federal funds for ETV if legislation
enacted. Suggest check to see if response forthcoming what you might
do to help. Governors response will have strong political impact so
important all reply soonest.
William G. Hartley
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
